lejos.hardware.device

Interface IRTransmitter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IRLink, RCXLink

    public interface IRTransmitter
    Interface for infra-red transmitters that can send bytes to an RCX
    Author:
    Lawrie Griffiths
